content.p: Career Currently, Amir is still involved with WWF-Malaysia and he plans on staying in the conservation sector as it is his passion. Amir plans on doing his Masterâ€™s in Geospatial Science. He finds that this wide topic can be vital when it comes to conservation. His interests include remote sensing, GIS and landscape ecology and he wishes to expand his knowledge on these skills in the future. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
